text:
@SenSchumer The WH will rely on experts to provide them with updates on the coronavirus & give recommendations on what the response should be.  

Then when Trump doesn't like what they have to say, he will undermine their work, contradict them, and fire them if at all possible. https://t.co/qx60qLlWp2

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
